mapper.select: SELECT pNum, pName, delivType, pCateName, pDate FROM product p JOIN productCategory c ON p.pCateNum = c.pCateNum
SELECT p.pNum, pName, pPrice, pDiscountRate, delivType, pDate, pDetailCnt, pDetailPrice FROM product p JOIN storeDetailOpt d ON p.pNum = d.pNum WHERE p.pNum = #{pNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET pPrice = ${pPrice}, pDiscountRate = ${pDiscountRate} WHERE pNum = #{pNum}
UPDATE storeDetailOpt SET pDetailCnt = ${pDetailCnt}, pDetailPrice = ${pDetailPrice} WHERE pNum = #{pNum}
